arts.ttl: Hannover 96 vs 1. FC Kaiserslautern preview: Two promotion hopefuls clash to kick off the season
arts.sum: On Sunday, Hannover play host to Kaiserslautern in what should be a thrilling encounter at the Heinz-Von-Heiden-Arena.
